cast.name: 弗兰奇·博伊尔 Frankie Boyle

writer.name: 弗兰奇·博伊尔 Frankie Boyle

this_title: Frankie Boyle: The Last Days of Sodom
trans_title: 弗兰奇·博伊尔：索多玛末日
introduction: A brand new live DVD from the brilliant comedian – coming in 2012. Recorded at his last ever tour.Frankie Boyle has been pilloried, misrepresented and demonised. And for what? For Telling It Like It Is. Now he will attempt a final tour, to heal Britain's fools. To support its rioters. To offer the inchoate laughter of despair to a culture in freefall. These are The Last Days of Sodom.
chinese_title: 弗兰奇·博伊尔：索多玛末日
foreign_title: Frankie Boyle: The Last Days of Sodom
